name: Sticknodes 2020
description:
fun for all ages! defend SN from the Irish-accented invaders with this easy to learn game! Inspired by the hit game Hong Kong 97.

no skill required, everything is RNG dependent.

Credits to:

Valve. Ritual Entertainment, Tripwire, Antimatter, Sticknodes, Alex from Lemmasoft, and the original owners of the other assets used. I do not claim everything used as my own aside from the convoluted scripting.
